N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.1013 - Deviations from required periodic inspections

State Regulations
(a) An operator may propose to reduce the
frequency of periodic inspections and tests required in this Part on the basis
of the engineering analysis and risk assessment required by sections 255.1003
through
255.1015
of this Part. (b) An operator must submit its proposal to
the Public Service Commission as prescribed in section
255.13
(c) of this

Part. The Public Service Commission may accept the proposal on its own
authority, with or without conditions and limitations, on a showing that the
operator's proposal, which includes the adjusted interval, will provide an
equal or greater overall level of safety. (c) An operator may implement an approved
reduction in the frequency of a periodic inspection or test only where the
operator has developed and implemented an integrity management program that
provides an equal or improved overall level of safety despite the reduced
frequency of periodic inspections. Notes
